description: When you save a template the ZW file is saved in the "ZooperWidget" folder in the SD card along with a .PNG screenshot of your widget. You can share the template by placing it in the "ZooperWidget" folder in the SD card of the recipient's device.
The free version of Zooper Widget cannot open the ZW file, only the Zooper Widget Pro can open the ZW file.
NOTE: Zooper Widget Pro has been discontinued and is no longer available for download.
